evaluations.query: Create a custom button component with CVA variants and OKLCH theming
expected_behavior: Uses CVA for type-safe variant definitions
Uses cn() utility for class merging without Tailwind conflicts
OKLCH color variables for perceptually uniform theming
Component extension wraps original without modifying source

evaluations.query: Create a sortable data table with shadcn and TanStack Table
expected_behavior: Uses TanStack Table useReactTable for state management
Column definitions use accessorKey with header render functions
Sorting toggles via header click with visual indicator
Pagination controls use shadcn Button components

evaluations.query: Implement a confirmation dialog for a destructive action
expected_behavior: Uses AlertDialog (not Dialog) for destructive confirmations
Has Dialog.Title and Dialog.Description for accessibility
Cancel and Action buttons with proper variant styling
Focus trapped within dialog, returns to trigger on close

evaluations.query: Create a button that is also a link using asChild composition
expected_behavior: Uses asChild prop to render Link as the button element
Child component forwards refs with React.forwardRef
Props and event handlers merge correctly via Slot
No extra wrapper div in the DOM output
